testsuite.name: Pending Sync Protection - User changed status in BookLore, waiting to sync to Kobo

testcase.name: User marks book UNREAD in BookLore -> Kobo sends 100% progress before sync -> UNREAD preserved until synced
User changes status AFTER last sync -> new status preserved until next sync completes
User marks book READ in BookLore -> Kobo sends 50% progress before sync completes -> READ status preserved until synced
